MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Willowbrae Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:49am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:49pm on the 12th of December 2020.
